# Spinner



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Default   |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the spinner.                             | `Partial<{ base: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; xs: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; s: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; m: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; l: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; xl: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; }> & { base: "small" \| "medium" \| "large" \| "inherit"; } \| string` | `'small'` |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | Adapts the spinner color depending on the theme. | `"dark" \| "light"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `'light'` |
